#Text=Croatia
#Text=Croatia ( Croatian : Hrvatska ) is a Mediterranean country that bridges Central Europe and the Balkans .
#Text=It is on the eastern side of the Adriatic Sea , across from Italy on the western side .
#Text=Croatia is bordered by Hungary to the north , Slovenia to the northwest , Serbia to the east , Bosnia and Herzegovina to the southeast , and Montenegro to the south .
#Text=Regions

#Text=There are three distinct areas of Croatia : Lowland Croatia ( cr : Nizinska Hrvatska ) , Littoral Croatia ( Primorska Hrvatska ) and Mountainous Croatia ( Gorska Hrvatska ) and these can be neatly split into five travel regions :
#Text=Cities

#Text=Climate
#Text=Northern Croatia has a temperate continental climate , while the central and upland regions have an Alpine climate .
#Text=The Adriatic coast has a pleasant Mediterranean climate .
#Text=Spring and autumn are mild along the coast , while winter is cold and snowy in the central and northern regions .
#Text=The average temperature inland in January ranges from -10°C to 5°C ; August 19°C to 39°C .
#Text=The average temperature at the seaside is higher : January 6°C to 11°C ; August 21°C to 39°C .
#Text=Terrain
#Text=Croatia 's geography is diverse with flat agricultural plains along the Hungarian border ( Central European area ) , low mountains and highlands near the Adriatic coastline , and islands .
#Text=There are 1,246 islands ; the largest ones are Krk and Cres .
#Text=The highest point is Dinara at 1,830 m.
#Text=History
#Text=In ancient times , what is now Croatia was part of the regions of Illyria and Dalmatia .
#Text=This region came under Roman control and became a province known as Illyricum from 27 BC .
#Text=In the 5th century , Rome was declining and the Ostrogoths seized an opportunity to rule the area for a short period .
#Text=The Avars arrived soon after , incorporating the land into the Avar Khaganate .
#Text=In the early 7th century the Croats came and defeated the Avars , and formed two duchies : Croatia and Pannonia .
#Text=The establishment of the Trpimirović Dynasty ca 850 strengthened the Dalmatian Croat Duchy , which together with the Pannonian principality became a kingdom in 925 under King Tomislav .

#Text=The independent Croatian kingdom lasted until 1102 when Croatia , after a series of dynastic struggles entered into a personal union with Hungary , with a Hungarian king ruling over both countries .

#Text=In 1526 , after the Battle of Mohács , in which Hungary suffered a catastrophic defeat against the Ottoman Turks , Croatia severed its relationship with Hungary and its parliament ( Sabor ) voted to form a new personal union with the Habsburg Monarchy .
#Text=Croatia remained an autonomous kingdom within the Hapsburg state ( and later Austria-Hungary ) until the empire 's dissolution following its defeat in World War I.

#Text=In 1918 , a short-lived State of Slovenes , Croats and Serbs ( carved out of south Slavic parts of Austria-Hungary ) joined the Kingdom of Serbia to form the Kingdom of Serbs , Croats and Slovenes , later renamed Yugoslavia in 1929 .
#Text=The new state was unitarist in character , erasing all historical borders within its new territorial division , which resulted in a strong movement for more autonomy for Croatia .
#Text=This was achieved in 1939 , only days before the start of World War II , when Croatia was granted broad autonomy within Yugoslavia as Banovina of Croatia .
#Text=When Germany and Italy attacked Yugoslavia in 1941 , the state was dissolved , parts of it annexed to Germany and Italy , and puppet governments installed in Croatia and Serbia .

#Text=Almost immediately , a strong resistance movement was formed , led by communist leader Josip Broz " Tito " ( whose father was a Croat ) , which gained broad popular support , but by the end of World War II , the Ustashe puppet government and its militia had systematically murdered approximately 30,000 Jews , 29,000 Roma , and at least 300,000 Serbs , mostly at the notorious death camp they built in Jasenovac .
#Text=After the end of World War II , a new , communist Yugoslavia was formed with Tito becoming " president for life " .
#Text=Tito ruled with a strong hand , using political repression and secret police to quell any separatist sentiments , with the official motto of the new country being " Brotherhood and Union " .

#Text=Still , because Yugoslavia did n't belong to the Warsaw Pact , having broken off political ties with the USSR in 1948 , it was by far the most open socialist country in Europe and its citizens enjoyed more civil liberties and a higher living standard than the rest of the Communist bloc .
#Text=After Tito 's death in 1980 , the weakening of political repression led to a period of political instability .

#Text=Faced with the rise of nationalist sentiment , a decade-long recession , and the weakening of communist grip on power on the eve of the fall of communism in Eastern Europe , the first free elections were held in Yugoslavia in almost 45 years .

#Text=In these elections , nationalists won power in all Yugoslav republics , leading to a rise in interethnic tensions , which culminated with Croatia and Slovenia declaring their independence from Yugoslavia in 1991 .
#Text=This led to open war in newly independent Croatia and later in Bosnia and Herzegovina which declared its independence in 1992 .
#Text=The wars ended four years later , in 1995 , with a decisive Croatian victory in Operation Storm , bringing peace to both countries .
#Text=The anniversary of Operation Storm is celebrated as Thanksgiving Day in Croatia every August 5 .
#Text=After a period of accelerated economic growth in the late 1990s and 2000s
#Text=Croatia joined NATO in 2009 and the European Union in 2013 .
#Text=Croatia today is a functioning liberal democracy , with a free market system and a robust welfare state .
